shadow_artifacts.emblems.fright.descript: Obtained by using Urkolow's Journal on a spider.
Any form of Urkolow's Journal can be used to obtain this emblem.
shadow_artifacts.emblems.torture.descrip: Obtained by using Urkolow's Journal on a Panda
Urkolow's Journal must be upgraded to the Blood Pact or better to obtain this emblem.
shadow_artifacts.emblems.betrayal.descri: Obtained by using Urkolow's Journal on a Wolf or Any Passive Mob
Any form of Urkolow's Journal can be used to obtain this emblem.
shadow_artifacts.emblems.dominance.descr: Obtained by using Urkolow's Journal on a Llama or Trader Llama
Any form of Urkolow's Journal can be used to obtain this emblem.
shadow_artifacts.emblems.rebirth.descrip: Obtained by using Urkolow's Journal on a Zombie
Any form of Urkolow's Journal can be used to obtain this emblem.
shadow_artifacts.emblems.screams.descrip: Obtained by using Urkolow's Journal on a Skeleton
Any form of Urkolow's Journal can be used to obtain this emblem.
shadow_artifacts.emblems.sacrifice.descr: Obtained by using Urkolow's Journal on a Bee
Urkolow's Journal must be upgraded to the Blood Pact or better to obtain this emblem.
shadow_artifacts.emblems.cruelty.descrip: Obtained by using Urkolow's Journal on a Dolphin
Urkolow's Journal must be upgraded to the Blood Pact or better to obtain this emblem.
shadow_artifacts.emblems.shadows.descrip: Obtained by using Urkolow's Journal on an Enderman
Any form of Urkolow's Journal can be used to obtain this emblem.
shadow_artifacts.emblems.raging.descript: Obtained by using Urkolow's Journal on a Piglin or a Hoglin
Urkolow's Journal must be upgraded to the Blood Pact or better to obtain this emblem.
shadow_artifacts.emblems.collapse.descri: Obtained by using Urkolow's Journal on an Iron Golem, Very Low Success Rate
Urkolow's Journal must be upgraded to the Undying Pact, Soulstorm Pact or better to obtain this emblem.
shadow_artifacts.emblems.viability.descr: Obtained by using Urkolow's Journal on a Polar Bear, Low Success Rate
Urkolow's Journal must be upgraded to the Undying Pact, Soulstorm Pact or better to obtain this emblem.
